texto: "Within 2 weeks of WHO learning of the first cases of the novel coronavirus, 🇨🇳 shared the genetic sequences with WHO & the wider 🌍. Working with our partner lab in 🇩🇪, Charite University we published the 1st instructions on how to build a validated #COVID19 PCR test"-@DrTedros

The reality is that this coronavirus spreads easily, it can be fatal to people of all ages & most people remain susceptible."-@DrTedros

The Solidarity Trial was established by WHO to find an effective #COVID19 treatment for hospitalized patients.

https://t.co/dCxHqBIwtr

#coronavirus

Interim trial results show that hydroxychloroquine and lopinavir/ritonavir produce little or no reduction in the mortality of hospitalized #COVID19 patients when compared to the existing standard of care.

More https://t.co/dCxHqBIwtr

#coronavirus

WHO accepted the recommendation from the Solidarity Trial’s International Steering Committee to discontinue the trial’s hydroxychloroquine and the lopinavir/ritonavir arms. 

More https://t.co/dCxHqBIwtr

#COVID19 #coronavirus

#HealthWorkers, you can help women survivors of violence during #COVID19:

🤝 Offer first-line support to women
🩹  Provide medical treatment
❤️ Connect and refer to survivors to support

#coronavirus https://t.co/1KIRkKlFmd

If you are experiencing violence during #COVID19:

🤝 Reach out to supportive family, friends or neighbours
📞 Call a hotline or access information online if possible
🆘 Seek out local services for survivors

#coronavirus https://t.co/d30cPDKLoc

During the #COVID19 pandemic, risks of violence against 👩👩👩 increase due to:

❗️ More time at home with abusers
❗️ Rising stress
❗️ Isolation from social support networks
❗️ Limited access to critical services

Asymptomatic: people who are infected but never go on to develop symptoms

Pre-symptomatic: people who are infected but have not yet developed symptoms

Symptomatic: people who are infected and showing symptoms
